name: Middle Data Engineer
description:
VOLKA DATA CREW / Middle Data Engineer

We are a fast-growing international gaming company, looking for a focused and talented Middle Data Engineer to join our team!

Your responsibilities:

  • Design, implement, document and maintain data pipelines between different types of data sources
  • Design, implement, document and maintain data storages and views for reporting and analytics

Skills and requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science / IT
  • Python: steady skill working with standard structures and pythonic algorithms, using database connectors and making HTTP requests to remote services
  • SQL: steady application of Window functions, CTE, DDL
  • Good understanding of work principles of SQL and NoSQL database management systems
  • Comfortable working with large datasets
  • Good knowledge and experience working with HTML5
  • Experience building classic software solutions
  • Experience building AWS Serverless (cloud-native) applications from scratch
  • Excellent debugging and troubleshooting skills
  • Basic administration skills of Windows and Linux operating systems;
  • Strong experience in Git, CI\CD
  • Comfortable sifting through large manuals and guides

As a plus:

  • Experience working with GA and GTM
  • Different flavors of SQL (PostgreSQL, ClickHouse, MySQL, PrestoDB etc.)

Other requirements:

  • Continuous lifetime learning attitude
  • Critical thinking
  • Working in a team: integrity, openness to others opinion, team planning and tracking of work
  • Strong ability to translate business requirements into technical requirements
  • Experience in game industry and user acquisition is desirable
  • Passion for playing games
  • English: Upper-Intermediate

What we offer:

  • Competitive salary + 13th salary
  • Almost unlimited access to L&D Opportunities
  • Medical insurance for the employee and family members
  • 21 days Annual Leave + Any National Holidays that fall on a weekend
  • Daily lunch in our office
  • Individual workstation with the best high-quality Gear and Equipment
  • Remote work: We work in an office and it’s our culture. But don’t be afraid. Our culture also has a foundation on fairness and trust. In agreement with the team leader, remote work is possible.
  • Flexible working hours - Monday to Friday 09:00-18:00 or 10:00-19:00 (1hr lunch break)
  • Fun corporate activities that explore our amazing island hub
  • Unlimited access to our corporate bikes
  • Feeling overloaded? Chill with a friendly console game round with your co-workers in our office lounge area
  • 5 psychotherapy sessions per year at the company's expense from online accredited psychotherapy portals
  • Full support for any relocation and/or work permit Issuance if needed

Do you have what it takes? Use the link below to apply now!

https://jobs.lever.co/volka/1e52fd95-b7d6-4b83-a210-00be899d8e5c

*Note: Only CV's in English Language will be accepted.

We are committed to protecting and respecting your privacy. We handle personal data in accordance with the data protection laws. For more information regarding how we process the data you provide, kindly review our Privacy Policy for Job Applicants. By submitting this application, you agree to the processing of your personal data as set out in our privacy notice.

specializations.name: Передача данных и доступ в интернет
